vote.text: Amendment SA 3832 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3832 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Jeffords. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10353) To provide for communications equipment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3832 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3832 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Jeffords.
